Method Detail

connect

public Connection connect(Request req)
                   throws IOException
Description copied from interface: Transport
发起HTTP请求

使用connect()发起请求, 请求的响应的body需要通过Connection来处理, Request 对象上的body会被忽略, 返回的Response也获取不到body数据

Specified by:
connect in interface Transport
Returns:
Throws:
IOException

request

public Response request(Request req)
                 throws IOException
Description copied from interface: Transport
发起HTTP请求

使用request()发起HTTP请求, 请求的body需要通过Request.setBody(byte[] body)提供, 响应的body数据直接通过返回的Response.getBody()获取

Specified by:
request in interface Transport
Parameters:
req - Request
Returns:
Response
Throws:
IOException
